QuestData.Title: A Lumbering Relic
QuestData.Description: Margol the Rager's an old thunder lizard seen round these parts. Legend has it that he's been here in the gorge since before it was even a gorge. Legend also has it that he ate my brother Barnabas.$b$bI don't care how old he is or what kind of magic he shoots out of his nose. I just want him dead. For Barnabas' sake.$b$bYou'll find him wandering the cliffs to the south of here.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The ancient warden of Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: Yup, this was Margol's horn alright. No doubt about it.$b$bBarnabas was a digger, like me. He never stood a chance in combat against the beast. I'm glad you were here to set things right.
